name: Wave Drivers
description:
You and your AI Car Jeff have to stop an Evil Microwave that wants to control the Universe! It can easily be turned off, but it keeps throwing roadblocks on your way. Can you reach him?

Controls:

A/D or left/right

1,2,3,4 and Esc for Menus

press F to start the game.

If you like the Music, feel free to check out my Youtube Music Channel ^^ : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOFMPOxqzCpNJ4AltUkRitg
